page.title: 09LEYTON PARISH CHURCH
page.content: LEYTON PARISH CHURCH is in Church Street,Leyton E10. It is St.Mary and St. Edwards Church and there has been a church here for hundreds of years. The church has bells which are rung regularly and it has some beautiful Stained Glass Windows. There are some nice brasses and decorations. There is an alcove which looks like a small room,which has some lifesize statues and inscriptions on the walls.At one time bodies were buried in the walls of the church. The church has quite a large graveyard and an interesting door knocker on the west door.
